description: Detects DNS queries for ip lookup services such as api.ipify.org not originating from a non browser process.
false_positives: Legitimate usage of ip lookup services such as ipify API
name: Suspicious DNS Query for IP Lookup Service APIs
query: (dns.question.name:("canireachthe.net" OR "ipv4.icanhazip.com" OR "ip.anysrc.net" OR "edns.ip\-api.com" OR "wtfismyip.com" OR "checkip.dyndns.org" OR "api.2ip.ua" OR "icanhazip.com" OR "api.ipify.org" OR "ip\-api.com" OR "checkip.amazonaws.com" OR "ipecho.net" OR "ipinfo.io" OR "ipv4bot.whatismyipaddress.com" OR "freegeoip.app" OR "ifconfig.me") AND (NOT (process.executable.text:(*\\Google\\Chrome\\Application\\chrome.exe OR *\\iexplore.exe OR *\\firefox.exe OR *\\brave.exe OR *\\opera.exe OR *\\msedge.exe OR *\\vivaldi.exe OR *\\chromium.exe OR *\\microsoftedge.exe OR *\\iexplorer.exe OR *\\CCleaner\ Browser\\Application\\CCleanerBrowser.exe))))
author: Brandon George (blog post)
Thomas Patzke (rule)
